column4: big problem with ubuntu. I can access the web with my main account. But on regular user accounts evolution will not load email. Firefox will load a page or 2 then give me a "connection reset by peer". Does anyone else use multiple accounts? why does the internet only work sometimes? Yes I checked permissions and everything is there.
I have an ubuntu system set up with about 20 active users.  they've never had any problems accessing the internet.
that is really odd. all of that private data should live in each user's .mozilla directory and shouldn't affect anyone else
so removing it shouldn't change anything
